name: Search high and low
description: Take a photo of a team member from at least 10 metres above them

rewards.name: Take a photo pointing directly up

name: Find yourself
description:
Spend 5 minutes meditating.
You must meditate under a tree, sitting on grass.

rewards.name: Take a photo containing one tree

name: Look for tracks
description:
Find a footprint. The footprint must have been created by a real foot. The footprint must be clear and show an entire foot. 
You may not create the footprint.

rewards.name: Take a screenshot of your location

name: Get a lookout
description: Go above the tenth floor of a building.

rewards.name: Take a photo pointing directly up

name: Report a pothole
description: Find a pothole and report it to the city of montreal.

name: Find nemo
description: Go to a dentist’s office on a street with an alliterative name.

name: Catch the golden snitch
description: Find something made of real gold. While there, reveal an embarrassing or incriminating fact about another player.

rewards.name: Take a picture of a body of water

name: Look for Alaska
description: Find a picture or depiction of Alaska.

rewards.name: How do we get to you?

name: Hunter x Hunter
description: Acquire three gold stars and add them to your outfit.

name: Desperately Seek Susan
description: Find a physical copy of a movie featuring an actor named Susan.

name: Go window shopping
description:
Find a window for sale.
The window must be clearly and inarguably a window.
It may be part of a larger object that is for sale.
It may not be part of a real building.

rewards.name: Take a photo of the dep

name: Become a detective
description: Find a magnifying glass, a pipe, and a deerstalker hat.

rewards.name: What is the price of the nearest hotel?

name: Get lucky
description: Find a real four-leafed clover.

name: Become the Sea King
description: Acquire or create a crown and a trident. Your crown must be golden, and your trident must be at least 1 metre long and have 3 prongs. Declare your dominance over a body of water.

rewards.name: How do we get to you?

name: Hunt for red october
description: Find the word “October” or “Octobre” written in red.

rewards.name: How good is the local timmies?

name: Spyglass
description: Look through a real telescope or binoculars

name: Find Waldo
description: Find a depiction of Waldo, or dress up as Waldo. Your Waldo costume must include a striped red and white top or hat.

rewards.name: Take a picture of a cup of coffee

name: Memorise the song “Hide and seek”
description: Memorise the lyrics to the song “Hide and Seek”. Perform the song with no assistance in one continuous attempt without any mistakes.

rewards.name: Send the length of your nearest park

name: Seek justice
description:
Try on a wig

Hit something with a hammer

Judge someone

rewards.name: Take a photo containing three buildings

name: Find a fantastic beast
description: Find an animal that is not a dog, cat, squirrel, bird or human. The animal must be alive.

rewards.name: Take a photo containing one tree
Take a photo pointing directly up

name: Learn a particular set of skills
description:
Each team member must learn a new skill.
Send a video to the hiders demonstrating your set of skills.

rewards.name: Take a picture of the chairs in a metro
Send the first letter of your nearest metro station

name: If You Seek Amy
description: Find a letter F, a letter U, a letter C and a letter K. Each letter must be at least 1 foot tall.

rewards.name: Send the first letter of your nearest metro station
How do we get to you?

name: Form a search party
description:
Each team member must perform one of the following actions:
Put on a crown

Blow up a balloon

Drink an alcoholic beverage

You may not perform the same action.

rewards.name: Take a picture of a cup of coffee

name: Close your eyes and count to ten
description:
As a team, close your eyes and say the numbers 1 to 10.
If you interrupt each other or say the same number, start again.
You may not discuss or plan a pattern.
You may not alternate.
All players must say at least one number.
You must leave at least 1 second between numbers.

name: Not lightly do the leaves of Lorien fall
description: Find a badge with a leaf on it

rewards.name: Send the length of your nearest park

name: Seek attention
description: Post a picture on social media. Within ten minutes, earn ten reactions. Your team may not react to the post.

rewards.name: Take a screenshot of your location

name: Search every part of the map
description: Find a map. Go to the location at each corner of that map.

name: Warmer
description: Completely melt something that is frozen

rewards.name: Take a picture of a cup of coffee

name: Colder
description: Cool down something that is above 50 degrees until it is room temperature
